validation.error.message-type-gif: Not sure how to interpret this gif\.\.\.
validation.error.message-type-animation: Not sure how to interpret this animation\.\.\.
validation.error.message-type-audio: Speech\-to\-text technology is too advanced for this bot\.
validation.error.message-type-document: This is just a humble bot, do you think it can understand a whole document?\!
validation.error.message-type-location: Searching by coordinates is too advanced for this bot\.
validation.error.message-type-photo: Image\-to\-text technology is too advanced for this bot\.
validation.error.message-type-sticker: Not sure how to interpret this sticker\.\.\.
validation.error.message-type-video: If images are too advanced for this bot, videos are definitely out of the question\.
validation.error.message-type-unknown: No idea what this message is about\!
validation.error.message-type-emoji: That's a cute emoji but this bot has no idea which hawker centre that could refer to\.
validation.error.base-message-format:
{{emoji}} {{errorMessage}}

Please try again with a text message\.
validation.error.generic: Woops, an unexpected error occurred\. You can report this issue using the /feedback command\.
general.error.unsupported-command.first: Woops, that isn't a supported command\.
general.error.unsupported-command.second:
Please try again with one of the following:
{{commands}}
general.command-start.explanation.first: An easy way to check if your favourite hawker centre is closed today\! {{emojis}}
general.command-start.explanation.second: Simply send the bot some *subset of the hawker centre name*, e\.g\. _{{example}}_\.
general.command-start.explanation.third: Type in /help to see how you can customise your query further, as well as other features of the bot\.
general.command-help.explanation.search-: The search query follows the structure:
general.command-help.explanation.favouri: You can manage your favourite hawker centres via the /fav and /del commands\.
Typing /list will show you all your favourites as well as their next closure dates, making for an even easier way for you to check on their closure status\!
search.example-format: e\.g\. _{{searchTerm}}_ will display the hawker centres containing the keyword __{{keyword}}__ that are closed __{{modifier}}__\.
search.error.next-month-data-unavailable: No data is available for next month yet, check back again in a while\!
search.no-hawker-centres-closed: All good\! No hawker centres {{keywordSnippet}}{{temporalVerbSnippet}} undergoing cleaning {{timePeriodSnippet}}\.
search.hawker-centres-closed.without-key: There are {{numResultsSnippet}} hawker centres that {{temporalVerbSnippet}} closed {{timePeriodSnippet}}:
search.hawker-centres-closed.with-keywor: Here are the hawker centres {{keywordSnippet}}that {{temporalVerbSnippet}} closed {{timePeriodSnippet}}:
favourites.command-fav.explanation.first: Please specify some keyword to filter the list of hawker centres for you to add to your favourites\.
favourites.command-del.explanation.first: To delete a favourite hawker centre, specify an index number based on the favourites list displayed by the /list command\.
favourites.error.too-many-results: Too many results to be displayed, please further refine your search\.
favourites.confirm-hawker-centre: Confirm that this is the hawker centre to be added?
favourites.hawker-centre-added: Great, adding *{{hcName}}* to your list of favourites\!
favourites.error.duplicate-hawker-centre: *{{hcName}}* is already in your favourites list\!
favourites.hawker-centre-removed: *{{hcName}}* has been deleted from your list of favourites\.
favourites.error.invalid-delete-index.fi: That is not a valid index number\.
favourites.error.invalid-delete-index.se: Try again with a value from 1 to {{numFavourites}}\.
favourites.list:
Your favourite hawker centres and their next closure dates are:

{{hcOutput}}
favourites.error.no-saved-favourites: You've not added any favourites yet\. Try adding some using the /fav command\.
feedback.command-feedback.explanation.fi: Type in your feedback after a /feedback command\.
feedback.feedback-added: Got it, thanks for your feedback\!
feedback.error-adding-feedback: Woops, couldn't handle saving your feedback for some unexpected reason\. Try again?
